thread.title: BARBARA TIDYMAN
thread.title_full: Easy Comforts reviewed by BARBARA TIDYMAN

author: BARBARA TIDYMAN
title: BARBARA TIDYMAN
text: I ordered for the first time by phone and had a good experience. I appreciated the immediate confirmation by Email from Easy Comforts. My merchandise came within the expected time. I had to return two items that weren't the right size, and because I am handicapped, a trip to the post office is difficult -- so I very much appreciate the ability to print out a return label, which automatically takes $5 off whatever my return postage would be. The USPS picked up the packages.
